title: [Large-Scale] Mobile Device-Enhanced Science Education Program for Low-Income High Schools in Nepal

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic science concepts and ability to operate simple mobile devices
context.additional_context: Mobile-Device-Dependent Environment Without Desktop/Notebook Computers, Considering Potential Instability in Internet Access

learning_goals: Students can explore science-related digital content (videos, simulations) using mobile devices and explain key concepts
Learners can systematically document experimental observations using internet-based science resources (dictionaries, learning apps)
By the end of instruction, students can present science portfolios (photos, videos, reports) created with mobile tools according to evaluation criteria
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
